metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9898 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: arch/arm/mach-msm/qdsp6v2/ultrasound/usf.c in the Qualcomm components inAndroid before 2016-08-05 on Nexus 5 and 7 (2013) devices does not properlyvalidate input parameters, which allows attackers to obtain sensitiveinformation via a crafted application, aka Android internal bug 28814690and Qualcomm internal bug CR554575.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
